Align Time Series

ts_align makes sure all time series cover the same time span and have the same regular frequency. ts_union only ensures that series have the same time stamps and also works with irregular series. For ts objects, the two functions have the same effect.

ts_align(x, fill = NA)

ts_union(x, fill = NA)

Arguments

x

ts-boxable time series, an object of class ts, xts, data.frame, data.table, or tibble.
fill

missign value specifier

Value

a ts-boxable time series, with the same class as the input.

Examples

ts_align(ts_df(ts_c(mdeaths, fdeaths = ts_window(fdeaths, end = "1977-01-01"))))
#>          id       time value
#> 1   mdeaths 1974-01-01  2134
#> 2   mdeaths 1974-02-01  1863
#> 3   mdeaths 1974-03-01  1877
#> 4   mdeaths 1974-04-01  1877
